name: MVPet's Github Page
body:
### Welcome to MVPet's Github Page
This is the page where all my major projects are hosted.
The source is available to download and all projects are playable.


### Projects are:

### Megaman Battle Chip Challenge Battle Arena
A fan made game I made to test out Unity 2D.

[http://mvpet.github.io/MMBNNE/](http://mvpet.github.io/MMBNNE/)

### 3D Game Thing
A playground used for testing out 3D game development.
Was done with Unity3D and is continuously updated.

[http://mvpet.github.io/3DThing](http://mvpet.github.io/3DThing)

### Buoyancy Simulation
A project I am currently lead for at ITMS at URI.
Was done with Unity3D and is continuously updated.

[http://mvpet.github.io/OceanPhysics](http://mvpet.github.io/OceanPhysics)

### Hunger Game
A project I did for the Nutrition department at URI
Was done with ActionScript3 and Flixel.

[http://mvpet.github.io/GreenEating](http://mvpet.github.io/GreenEating)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
